author: Rick Stein
method: Hardboil the eggs for 8 minutes. Drain, cover with cold water and leave to cool. To make the mustard mayonnaise, mix the mustard, egg yolks, white wine vinegar together in a bowl. Very gradually whisk in the oil to make a thick and creamy mayonnaise. Spoon into a pot, cover and chill until needed. Serve with the peeled hard boiled eggs.
ingredients: 10-12 eggs,  1 tbsp English mustard,  2 egg yolks,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  A good pinch of salt,  A few turns of white pepper mill,  300ml/Â½ pint sunflower oil
